GSD.description:
nfc: nfcmrvl: Fix memory leak in nfcmrvl_play_deferred

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.285 by commit f21f908347712b8288ffe83b531b5e977042b29c. For more details please see the references link.
